from the current game. The remaining amount will be 
credited back to your account at the end of this game.
Are you sure you want to leave this table?

messages.tableBonusUtilise: Bonus utilisation for this table is
messages.point_rummy_info:
Play for points which have a pre-decided value. One winner
wins the complete prize pool at the end of each game.
messages.pool_rummy_info:
Play until score reaches the maximum limit [101 or 201].
Winner of a deal gets 0 points and the rest accumulate
points which are added to their score. A fixed entry fee
forms the prize pool.
messages.deals_rummy_info:
Play with chips that are allocated at the beginning of the deal for
pre-decided number of deals. One winner wins all the chips at the end
of each deal. At the end of pre-decided number of deals, player with
maximum number of chips is selected as the winner for the game.
